name: pywinauto-mcp
description: Windows UI Automation MCP server with advanced security and monitoring capabilities including face recognition
author: Sandra Schi

tools.name: enroll_face
tools.description: Enroll a new face for recognition

name.description: Name or identifier for the person

image_file.description: Path to an image file containing the face

examples.name: Enroll face from image
examples.description: Enroll a new face from an image file

tools.name: verify_face_webcam
tools.description: Verify identity using webcam face recognition

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score to accept a match (0.1-1.0)

timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for face verification (seconds)

examples.name: Verify identity with high confidence
examples.description: Verify identity with 80% confidence, waiting up to 60 seconds

tools.name: monitor_sensitive_apps
tools.description: Monitor and alert on access to sensitive applications

app_names.description: List of application names to monitor (e.g., ['banking_app.exe', 'corporate_dashboard.exe'])

alert_email.description: Email address to send alerts to

examples.name: Monitor banking app access
examples.description: Monitor for banking app access during work hours and alert if accessed without webcam verification

tools.name: security_sweep
tools.description: Perform a comprehensive security sweep of the system

check_cameras.description: Check all available cameras for intruders

examples.name: Full security sweep
examples.description: Perform a comprehensive security sweep with high alert sensitivity

tools.name: detect_intruder
tools.description: Use available cameras to detect potential intruders

duration_minutes.description: Duration to monitor for intruders (in minutes)

alert_contacts.description: Email addresses to alert if intruder is detected

record_video.description: Record video when motion is detected

examples.name: Nighttime intruder detection
examples.description: Monitor for intruders overnight with high sensitivity

tools.name: monitor_workstation_activity
tools.description: Monitor workstation for unusual activity patterns

monitor_hours.description: Time windows to monitor for unusual activity

sensitive_apps.description: List of applications that require additional verification

examples.name: After-hours monitoring
examples.description: Monitor for after-hours access to sensitive applications

suggested_prompts: Enroll my face for secure login verification
Monitor my banking app and alert me if it's accessed without face verification after work hours
Set up face recognition for my workstation login
Perform a full security sweep of my home office and email me the report
Configure intruder detection with face recognition for my home office
Detect any motion in my home office when I'm not there and record video evidence
Alert me if any new USB devices are connected to my computer
Monitor for failed login attempts and lock the system after 3 failures
Create a time-lapse of my work area when motion is detected during off-hours
Monitor for any changes to system security settings and alert me immediately
Check if my webcam or microphone are being accessed without my knowledge
Monitor for unusual network activity when I'm away from my computer
Create a security log of all applications that access the clipboard

security_scenarios.name: Unauthorized Access Detection
security_scenarios.description: Detect and respond to unauthorized access attempts
steps: Monitor for login attempts outside of working hours
Verify identity using webcam when sensitive apps are accessed
Send security alerts for suspicious activities
Optionally lock the workstation or log out the user

security_scenarios.name: Physical Security Sweep
security_scenarios.description: Periodically check the physical security of the premises
steps: Scan for motion or unrecognized faces
Alert security personnel if unauthorized persons are detected

security_scenarios.name: Sensitive Application Monitoring
security_scenarios.description: Monitor and control access to sensitive applications
steps: Detect when sensitive applications are launched
Verify user identity through multiple factors
Log all access attempts and activities
Enforce session timeouts and automatic logouts

security_scenarios.name: Workstation Activity Audit
security_scenarios.description: Maintain a comprehensive audit of workstation activities
steps: Log all application usage and file access
Record network connections and data transfers
